mods.abstract: Black and white head-and-shoulders portrait of Brenda Lee. The photo was released by MCA Records and Dick Blake International, Inc. A piece of paper is taped to the right side of the photo. Handwritten notes on the piece of paper say, "Shoot at 88% 65 line crop 4 inches square see marks [1'6] ga wood base." On the back of the photo, a typed note says, "Jan. 1982." To view a poster that features the metal photoplate made from this photo, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21783.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
